name: Mystic Morphemes
description:
The Wizard's Path... To Education!

In this game, you play as a you Wizard, seeking education at the land's finest Wizard College... but education doesn't come cheap!  The College requires you to collect some artifacts for donation, so it looks like you'll have to collect a few.

Creating Spells with Morphemes

Using the ancient language of Melodica, the player can create objects, by combining two morphemes to make a magical word.  When cast, this word could have interesting effects, devastating outcomes... or nothing.  Hey, not every combination of letter makes sense, lsdifgvjmsld?  Go forth, and solve the puzzles with your spells!
